text: The Ice Pirates is a 1984 American science fiction comedy movie directed by Stewart Raffill and starring Robert Urich, Mary Crosby, Michael D. Roberts, Anjelica Huston, Ron Perlman, Bruce Vilanch, John Carradine. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 science fiction movies Category:1984 comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Stewart Raffill Category:Movies about water scarcity
title: The Ice Pirates
